question: [Challenge] Portugues: Informe which integer bin occurs most frequently com base no histograma.

qas.question: [Challenge] Portugues: Informe which integer bin occurs most frequently com base no histograma.
[Review] Nederlands: Meld how many samples were used in total vanuit het histogram.
[Brief] Dansk: Angiv how many entries fall inside the modal bin fra histogrammet.
